subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Colby Rasmus homered leading off the bottom of the first inning yesterday as the United States beat the Netherlands, 5-0, to advance to the final of the Baseball World Cup in Taipei, Taiwan. Cuba, which beat Japan, 5-3, will face the United States today.
